dt: {bc}the action or result of {d_link|breaking down|break down}: such as

dt.t: preventing a {wi}breakdown{/wi} of the health-care system

dt: {bc}a complete loss of physical, mental, or emotional vitality {bc}a physical, mental, or nervous collapse

dt.t: the {wi}breakdown{/wi} of water into hydrogen and oxygen

shortdef: the action or result of breaking down: such as
failure to progress or have effect : disintegration

dt: {bc}to cause to fall or collapse by breaking or shattering
{bc}to separate (something, such as a chemical compound) into simpler substances {bc}{sx|decompose||}
{bc}to take apart especially for storage or shipment and for later reassembling
{bc}to stop functioning because of breakage or wear
{bc}to succumb to mental or emotional stress

dt.t: finally {it}broke down{/it} and bought a computer

dt: {bc}to severely injure the supporting ligament or bones of the fetlock joint
{bc}to be susceptible to or undergo analysis or subdivision

pt: {sc}analyze{/sc} {sc}dissect{/sc} {sc}break down{/sc} mean to divide a complex whole into its parts or elements. {sc}analyze{/sc} suggests separating or distinguishing the component parts of something (such as a substance, a process, a situation) so as to discover its true nature or inner relationships.
{sc}dissect{/sc} suggests a searching analysis by laying bare parts or pieces for individual scrutiny.

pt.t: commentators {it}dissected{/it} every word of the speech

pt: {sc}break down{/sc} implies a reducing to simpler parts or divisions.

shortdef: to cause to fall or collapse by breaking or shattering
to divide into parts or categories

dt: {bc}an area along the side of a highway where vehicles are able to stop for an emergency

shortdef: an area along the side of a highway where vehicles are able to stop for an emergency

dt: {bc}a truck with special equipment on the back of it to tow away vehicles {bc}tow truck

shortdef: a truck with special equipment on the back of it to tow away vehicles : tow truck

dt: {bc}an attack of mental or emotional disorder especially when of sufficient severity to require hospitalization

shortdef: an attack of mental or emotional disorder especially when of sufficient severity to require hospitalization

dt.t: Water can be {it}broken down into{/it} hydrogen and oxygen through electrolysis.
Water can {it}break down into{/it} hydrogen and oxygen through electrolysis.
The report is {it}broken down into{/it} three sections.

dt: {bc}to be able to be divided into parts or groups

dt.t: The report {it}breaks down into{/it} three sections.

shortdef: to become separated into simpler substances
